H3.text: who sang i want to be bobbys girl. Marcie Blane

A4.text: Marcia Blank (born May 21, 1944), known as Marcie Blane, is an American former pop singer known for her 1962 hit song, 'Bobby's Girl'.

A5.text: As a favor to a friend, Blane recorded a demo for Seville Records. The song was 'Bobby's Girl'.
